name: Trash Duck
description:
[this is a game for the i can't draw game jam]

Game inspire by SwordShot Pelican 

He a crazy pelican going to a crazy dimension to fight slime.

     

Slime

There are the only enemy that you need to kill and at a random chance they will move fast. 

 

  

Bomb

Try to avoid them or don't shot them. 

Control FireLeft Mouse Button Game pad A,B,X,Y
